headline: Micas Networks Achieves 4 Million Link Flap-Free Hours in Testing of Industry’s First 51.2T Co-Packaged Optics Switch
summary: Micas CPO Switch Micas Networks’ 51.2T Co-Packaged Optics (CPO) switch system has achieved a major milestone. During testing, the CPO switch achieved 4 million cumulative 400G equivalent port device hours of link flap-free operation, which underscores the reliability of CPO and validates its role as the foundation for next-generation network infrastructure.
